## Description {#details}

The execution count information starting at a point in a file.

A sequence of CoverageSegments gives execution counts for a file in format that&#39;s simple to iterate through for processing.

Definition at line 838 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/include/llvm/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-h">CoverageMapping.h</a>.
